channel.title: CVE Feed for Business Directory Team -- Business Directory Plugin – Easy Listing Directories for WordPress
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Business Directory Team -- Business Directory Plugin – Easy Listing Directories for WordPress

item.title: CVE-2023-5803|2024-08-02T08:14:24.925Z -- business%20directory%20team -- business%20directory%20plugin%20%E2%80%93%20easy%20listing%20directories%20for%20wordpress
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Business Directory Team Business Directory Plugin – Easy Listing Directories for WordPress allows Cross-Site Request Forgery.This issue affects Business Directory Plugin – Easy Listing Directories for WordPress: from n/a through 6.3.10.
